name: Stacker (itch) (Datamasa)
description:
Game idea is to build stack of boxes and have it standing high enough on the platform after 30 seconds to win.

Game is made  for 2022 GDevelop Game Jam #1

I rushed my late start trought the last weekend of the GameJam to get the game started and completed in time. This being my first game to get in "published" stage I am really proud of it and I hope you like it too.
